metadata.title: CVE-2022-30045 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libezxml.a in ezXML 0.8.6. The function ezxml_decode() performs incorrect memory handling while parsing crafted XML files, leading to a heap out-of-bounds read.

criterions.comment: mapcache package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
netcdf package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
netcdf-parallel package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
scilab package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
